formElement.label: Destination Directory:
formElement.documentation: The destination directory where sources will be stored after checking out the code.

formElement.label: Checkout sub-projects:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to copy all subprojects in the specified project hierarchy.

formElement.label: Purpose:
formElement.documentation: The purpose must be the name of a valid defined purpose and valid for the release of the project.

formElement.label: Release:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the release to use for the new copied project.

formElement.label: Version:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the version of the checked out project.
